comment._content: I doubt you'll get a Google Street View equivalent of this picture!

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This photo appears to have been taken at the entrance to the Atlantic Dock (aka "Atlantic Basin") looking towards the northeast. Here is an illustration of the Atlantic Dock: chestofbooks.com/reference/American-Cyclopaedia-1/Brookly... chestofbooks.com/reference/American-Cyclopaedia-1/images/... Here's a Google Maps link to a very rough approximation of where this photo was taken: maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&rls=com.microsoft:en-us:IE... Today, this location is now the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal, where RMS Queen Mary 2 now docks in New York. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooklyn_Cruise_Terminal

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 22, 2011, TVL1970 suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
